scripts.buildjsx: (cat ./src/modules/modules.jsx && find ./src/theme -type f -name '*.jsx' -exec cat {} \;&& find ./src/components -type f -name 'style.jsx' -exec cat {} \; && find ./src/components -type f -name '*.jsx' ! -name 'style.jsx' | xargs cat && cat ./src/main.jsx)
scripts.build: (echo "const httpPrefix='';" && npm run --silent buildjsx) > ../data/main.jsx && npm run --silent buildhtml  > ../data/index.html
scripts.localipsetup: grep -qv putyourespipornamehere ./src/espaddr.jsx && echo Esp IP -- OK || (echo 'Please populate the ./src/espaddr.jsx file wit the ip address of the test device' && exit 3)
scripts.localsetup: [ -d ./local ] || mkdir local && npm run localipsetup && echo localsetup -- OK
scripts.buildlocal: npm run localsetup && (cat ./src/espaddr.jsx && npm run --silent buildjsx) > ./local/main.jsx && npm run --silent buildhtml  > ./local/index.html
scripts.rebuild: npm run localsetup && node ./node_modules/fs-watch-exec/index.js run -d ./src 'npm run buildlocal'
scripts.start: npm run localsetup && (npm run rebuild& node ./node_modules/serve/build/main.js ./local)
